title: 关于cmi 和vault
author: 丫叽
txt_content:
[23:03:34 INFO]: [CMI] Vault was found but economy engine is missing. Use one from list provided in https://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/vault/
[23:03:34 INFO]:   Vault was found but not economy plugin, you will have limited economy support

上面是后台显示 
说有 但是miss 怎么弄？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 安装经济插件。比如 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-891070-1-1.html 之类的

replies.author: 丫叽
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-18 23:10
安装经济插件。比如 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-891070-1-1.html 之类的
想问一下 为啥之前用ess不需要

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
丫叽 发表于 2020-3-18 23:13
想问一下 为啥之前用ess不需要
因为 ess 内置经济插件

replies.author: 贺兰兰
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-18 23:10
安装经济插件。比如 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-891070-1-1.html 之类的
其实CMI是自带经济系统的。。。所以我还是推荐用自带的。。。在CMI原帖找到CMIinjector以加载CMI经济系统
